attributes.action: Impose mandatory silencers on noisy garden tools such as strimmers, lawnmowers and hedge cutters
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The British summer is characterised by the incessent drone and whine of garden power tools.  While undoubtedly useful, why do these machines need to be so noisy? Can they not be fitted with silencers on the production line, thus reducing noise pollution and nuisance.  These machines are very, very loud, and can spoil a lovely day relaxing in the garden.
